description: Retrieves the Puppet control repo and job script for the specified job instance id.

cd4pe_web_ui_endpoint.description: web ui endpoint of CD4PE. Used to download control repo and job scripts to execute jobs.

cd4pe_token.description: Token used to hit Tokened CD4PE endpoints.

cd4pe_job_owner.description: Account (workspace) owner of the job to be run.

env_vars.description: Environment variables to be set on the agent running the job.

docker_image.description: If specified, te job will attempt to run inside the docker container.

docker_run_args.description: If specified, the arguements will be passed to docker if docker image is specified.
